title: Create an Ad-Hoc Report
description: A business leader needs an ad-hoc report of all employees in their division who have a specific certification.

tasks.description: Clarify the reporting requirements: division, certification name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the request is for the 'Sales' division and the 'PMP' certification.

tasks.description: Build a custom query in the HRIS reporting tool to filter for the specified criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully builds and runs the query.

tasks.description: Generate and deliver the list of employees to the business leader.
